metadata.title: Acceptance Criteria Content Block
metadata.purpose: Generates SMART acceptance criteria using AI

elements.prompt_template:
Based on this coordination request:

Title: {{title}}
{% if description %}Description: {{description}}{% endif %}
{% if background %}Background: {{background}}{% endif %}
{% if rationale %}Rationale: {{rationale}}{% endif %}

Generate 5-10 SMART (Specific, Measurable, Achievable, Relevant, Time-bound) acceptance criteria as a JSON array of strings.

Each criterion should:
- Be measurable and verifiable (include numbers/thresholds where applicable)
- Be specific enough to determine pass/fail
- 10-200 characters
- Use present tense verbs

Example format:
[
  "Feasibility assessment addresses ≥3 key integration challenges",
  "Comparison evaluates ≥2 generation approaches with examples",
  "Recommendations include specific architecture diagrams",
  "Pilot plan defines measurable success criteria with ≥80% quality threshold"
]

Return ONLY the JSON array of strings, no additional text or formatting.
elements.example_output:
[
  "Documentation is complete and accurate",
  "All tests pass"
]
